chart.title: Number of animal species losing habitat due to cropland expansion by 2050
chart.subtitle: The projected number of mammal, bird and amphibian species losing a certain extent of habitat by 2050 as a result of cropland expansion globally under a business-as-usual-scenario.
chart.citation: Williams, Clark, Buchanan, Ficetola, Rondinini, & Tilman (2021). Proactive conservation to prevent habitat losses to agricultural expansion. Nature Sustainability.
